# parent

**Instance Property**

The parent window to which the window is attached as a child.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var parent: NSWindow? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property should be set from a subclass when it is overridden by a subclass’s implementation. It should not be set otherwise.

Note that calling [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/orderOut(_:)] on a child window causes the window to be removed from its parent window before it is itself removed.

## Managing Attached Windows

- **childWindows**: An array of the window’s attached child windows.
- **addChildWindow(_:ordered:)**: Adds a given window as a child window of the window.
- **removeChildWindow(_:)**: Detaches a given child window from the window.
